name: Samhwa Networks
overview: Samhwa Networks engages in the production of entertainment programs and the manufacture of communication equipment in South Korea. The company primarily produces TV drama series, original sound tracks, movies, documentaries, and other entertainment contents. It exports and distributes movies and TV dramas, as well as develops merchandising products. Samhwa Networks Co. also engages in the scouting and management of entertainers. In addition, it offers mobile and network equipment. The company, formerly known as Ezon Co, Ltd., was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

milestones.description: Samhwa Networks Co Ltd acquires a minority stake in Vision 3 International Co Ltd.
milestones.source_description: Samhwa Networks Co Ltd acquires a minority stake in Vision 3 International Co Ltd
